tuv.seg: In general, does the EU conjure up for you a very positive, fairly positive, neutral, fairly negative or very negative image? {#SD15_ins}
Ali ima Evropska unija za vas na splošno zelo pozitiven, dokaj pozitiven, nevtralen, dokaj negativen ali zelo negativen ugled? {#SD15_ins}
Please enter a value between 0 and 20.
Don't know/No Answer (DO NOT READ OUT)

The European General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) requires us to first speak to a parent or legal guardian of a teenager. Can I speak to this teenager’s parent or legal guardian? (SINGLE ANSWER, DO NOT READ OUT)

Evropska uredba o varstvu podatkov (GDPR) zahteva, da najprej govorimo s staršem ali zakonitim skrbnikom najstnika. Lahko govorim s staršem ali zakonitim skrbnikom tega najstnika? (EN ODGOVOR, NE BERITE)
General Secretariat of the Council of the European Union
You have used the browser buttons, please use the Next/Previous buttons below.
Uporabili ste gumbe za brskanje. Prosimo, uporabite gumba Naprej/Nazaj spodaj.
Is your company…? (READ OUT, ONE ANSWER ONLY)
Je vaše podjetje ...? (PREBERITE, SAMO EN ODGOVOR)

The survey includes some questions that could be considered sensitive as they relate to political opinions. You may refuse to answer these questions at any time, and you can withdraw your consent for participation at any time.
Anketa vsebuje nekaj vprašanj, ki bi lahko veljala za občutljive, saj so povezana s političnimi stališči. Kadarkoli lahko zavrnete odgovor na ta vprašanja in umaknete soglasje za sodelovanje.
Answer '{ANSWER}' is not an integer value.
Yes, I am the parent/legal guardian

Thank you for your time. We remind you that if you would like to read the Data Protection Notice, you can access it at {#intro_link}. This explains the purposes for processing your personal data as well as your rights under applicable data protection law.

Hvala za vaš čas. Naj vas spomnimo, da lahko, če želite prebrati obvestilo o varstvu podatkov, do njega dostopite na: {#intro_link}. To pojasnjuje namene obdelave vaših osebnih podatkov in vam pojasnjuje vaše pravice glede zakonodaje o varstvu podatkov.
There are too many answers, only {MAXANSWERS} are allowed.
Vprašanje '{QUESTION}' ({QUESTION_NUMBER}): Izbrali ste preveč odgovorov, samo {MAXANSWERS} je dovoljenih.
How many children under the age of 15 are living in your household?
Koliko otrok, mlajših od 15 let, živi v vašem gospodinjstvu?
How old were you when you stopped full-time education? {#D4_ins}
Koliko ste bili stari, ko ste zaključili redno izobraževanje?
Does your company sell … (READ OUT – MULTIPLE ANSWERS POSSIBLE)
Ali vaše podjetje prodaja … (PREBERI - VEČ MOŽNIH ODGOVOROV)
Are you a permanent resident of {#MRK_Country}?
Over the last year, would you say that this image you have of the EU improved, got worse or stayed about the same? {#SD15_ins}
Ali bi dejali, da se je v zadnjem letu vaše mnenje o EU izboljšalo, poslabšalo ali ostalo približno enako? {#SD15_ins}
16 years or older (not available, call back later)
16 let ali starejši/-a (ni na voljo, pokliči pozneje)
Interviewer instruction: Do not read, just fill in your interviewer_ID.
Navodilo za anketarja: Ne preberite, samo vnesite svoj ID anketarja.
I’m rather sceptical of the European Union, but could change my opinion if radical reform was brought about
Glede Evropske unije sem dokaj skeptičen(-a), vendar bi svoje mnenje lahko spremenil(-a), če bi bile sprejete radikalne reforme
When was your company established? (READ OUT, ONE ANSWER ONLY)
Kdaj je bilo vaše podjetje ustanovljeno?
Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply
OSKRBA Z ELEKTRIČNO ENERGIJO, PLINOM IN PARO
(WRITE DOWN AGE IN YEARS IF RESPONDENT IS 15 YEARS OR OVER)
(ZAPIŠITE STAROST V LETIH, ČE JE ANKETIRANEC STAR 15 LET ALI VEČ)

Those are all the questions we have for you today. Thank you for your time.

All information you provide is kept strictly confidential and is used for research purposes only.

To so vsa vprašanja, ki jih imamo danes za vas. Hvala za vaš čas.

Vse informacije, ki jih predložite, so hranjene strogo zaupno in se uporabljajo samo za raziskovalne namene.
16 years or older (will pass phone to start the interview)
16 let ali starejši/-a (predaja telefona za začetek ankete)
Over the past two years, has your company's total number of employees increase, decreased or remained about the same? (DO NOT READ OUT, ONE ANSWER ONLY)
Se je v zadnjih dveh letih skupno število zaposlenih v vašem podjetju povečalo, zmanjšalo ali ostalo približno enako? (NE BERITE, SAMO EN ODGOVOR)
The thousands separator character is not allowed.
Vprašanje '{QUESTION}' ({QUESTION_NUMBER}): Ločilo za tisočice ni dovoljeno.
General management, director or top management
Splošni menedžement, direktor ali vodstveni menedžment
Consumers, Health, Agriculture and Food Executive Agency
Agencija EU za varstvo potrošnikov, zdravja, kmetijstva in hrane
Do you use more than one mobile phone? {#D2_ins}
Uporabljate več kot en mobilni telefon? {#D2_ins}
Water Supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities
OSKRBA Z VODO; RAVNANJE Z ODPLAKAMI IN ODPADKI; SANIRANJE OKOLJA
Over the past two years, has your company's annual turnover increased, decreased or remained unchanged? (DO NOT READ OUT, ONE ANSWER ONLY)
Ali se je v zadnjih dveh letih letni promet vaše družbe povečal, zmanjšal ali ostal nespremenjen? (NE BERITE, SAMO EN ODGOVOR)
Answer '{ANSWER}' is not an integer value.
Yes (will pass phone to start the interview)
Da (predal bom telefon za začetek ankete)
Targeted respondent not available, call back later
Ciljni anketiranec ni na voljo, pokličite pozneje
Human health and social work activities
15 years old, but not available/not at home
There are too few answers, at least {MINANSWERS} are required.
Izbrali ste premalo odgovorov, izbrati jih morate najmanj {MINANSWERS}.

The survey includes some questions that could be considered sensitive as they relate to political opinions. Your child may refuse to answer these questions at any time, and you can withdraw your consent for your child’s participation at any time.

Anketa vsebuje nekaj vprašanj, ki bi lahko veljala za občutljive, saj so povezana s političnimi stališči. Vaš otrok lahko kadarkoli zavrne odgovor na ta vprašanja, vi pa lahko kadarkoli umaknete vaše soglasje za njegovo sodelovanje.
As far as your current occupation is concerned, would you say you are...? {#D2_ins}
Kar zadeva vašo trenutno zaposlitev, bi rekli, da ste ...? {#D2_ins}
I’m rather in favour of the European Union, but not the way it has been realised until now
Evropski uniji sem dokaj naklonjen(-a), a ne taki, kot je bila uresničena do danes
Thank you for your participation. Please click next and then close the browser.
Hvala za sodelovanje. Kliknite naprej, nato pa zaprite brskalnik.
You entered an unexpected value, please review your answer or continue to confirm your response.
Vnesli ste nepričakovano vrednost, preglejte svoj odgovor ali nadaljujte za potrditev svojega odgovora.
The thousands separator character is not allowed.

Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are looking for people aged 15 or over who are willing to share their opinions about the issues of today’s society.
Can I speak to the person in your household, 15 years or older, whose birthday it was most recently? INTERVIEWER ADD IF NECESSARY: this is necessary to ensure everyone has an equal chance to participate, for the survey to be representative of this country’s population.
How old is he or she? Can you pass the phone to this household member?
{#Birthday_ins} Household member with the most recent birthday is:

Pozdravljeni. Sem … iz (IME NACIONALNEGA INŠTITUTA) in izvajam anketo za podjetje Ipsos Public Affairs v imenu ene od njihovih strank. Iščemo ljudi, stare 15 let ali več, ki so pripravljeni deliti svoja mnenja o zadevah današnje družbe.
Lahko govorim s tisto osebo v vašem gospodinjstvu, staro 15 let ali več, ki je nazadnje imela rojstni dan? ČE JE POTREBNO, ANKETAR DODA: To je nujno, da imajo vse osebe isto možnost sodelovanja, anketa pa je tako reprezentativna za prebivalce te države.
Koliko je star/-a? Lahko k telefonu pokličete tega člana gospodinjstva?
{#Birthday_ins} Član gospodinjstva, ki je imel nazadnje rojstni dan je:
Wholesale and retail trade; repair of motor vehicles and motorcycles
TRGOVINA NA DEBELO IN DROBNO KAKRŠNEKOLI VRSTE (VKLJUČNO Z VZDRŽEVANJEM IN POPRAVILI MOTORNIH VOZIL)
Would you say you live in...? {#D2_ins}
50% or more owned or controlled by persons from other countries outside (THIS COUNTRY)
V 50% ali večji lasti ali pod nadzorom oseb iz drugih držav izven Slovenije
Below 10% owned by persons from other countries outside (THIS COUNTRY)
V manj kot 10% lasti oseb iz drugih držav izven Slovenije
None, sole trader (DO NOT READ OUT)
Please enter a value between 15 and 105. If you are less than 15 years old, you are not eligible to participate in this study.
Vnesite vrednost med 15 in 105. Če ste stari manj kot 15 let, ne morete sodelovati v tej raziskavi.
Are you happy to proceed with the interview?
Please enter a value between 0 and 99.

(READ IF TARGET RESPONDENT IS NOT THE PERSON WHO FIRST ANSWERED THE PHONE) Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are looking for people aged 15 or over who are willing to share their opinions about the issues of today’s society. We are conducting this survey across Europe. The survey is not part of any market research, we are interested in measuring public opinion.
(READ FOR ALL RESPONDENTS) I would be grateful if you could spare {#minutes_ins} minutes to participate in this survey. Participation in the survey is voluntary and you can change your mind at any time. All of your answers will remain confidential and will be combined with all other participants’ answers. This means you will not be identifiable in any of the published results. {#CONSENT_ins}
If you would like to read the Data Protection Notice, you can access it at {#intro_link}. This explains the purpose for processing your personal data as well as your data protection rights.
For quality assurance, this phone call may be monitored and recorded.
INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: HOW DID YOU GET MY NUMBER: Your telephone number has been randomly generated by a computer, like all numbers we dial for this research. Our aim is to interview a representative sample of this country’s population.
CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for the {#Client}. Flash Eurobarometer surveys have as purpose to monitor public opinion in the European Union on a broad range of thematic issues.
WHAT PERSONAL DATA WILL BE COLLECTED: We use your phone number to invite you to take part in this interview and for quality control purposes only. Gender and age information will be collected, as well as personal data from the replies to the interview questions (such as marital status). All of the information you provide will remain confidential, your answers will be combined with all other participants’ answers, and no identifiable data will be shared with Ipsos’ client.
Are you happy to proceed with the interview? {#Birthday_ins}

(PREBERITE, ČE TELEFONA NI DVIGNIL CILJNI ANKETIRANEC, AMPAK DRUGA OSEBA) Pozdravljeni. Sem … iz (IME NACIONALNEGA INŠTITUTA) in izvajam anketo za podjetje Ipsos Public Affairs v imenu ene od njihovih strank. Iščemo ljudi, stare 15 let ali več, ki so pripravljeni deliti svoja mnenja o zadevah današnje družbe. To anketo izvajamo po celi Evropi. Anketa ni del nobene tržne raziskave, zanima nas merjenje javnega mnenja.
(ZA VSE ANKETIRANCE) Hvaležen/-na bi vam bil/-a, če bi si lahko vzeli {#minutes_ins} minut za sodelovanje v tej anketi. Sodelovanje v anketi je prostovoljno in kadarkoli si lahko premislite. Vsi vaši odgovori bodo ostali zaupni in bodo združeni z odgovori drugih anketirancev. To pomeni, da vas ne bo mogoče prepoznati v nobenih objavljenih rezultatih. {#CONSENT_ins}
Če želite prebrati obvestilo o varstvu podatkov, lahko do njega dostopite na {#intro_link}. To pojasnjuje namen obdelave vaših osebnih podatkov in vam pojasnjuje vaše pravice glede varstva podatkov.
Zaradi zagotavljanja kakovosti se ta klic lahko spremlja in snema.
ANKETAR DODA, ČE JE TREBA: KAKO STE DOBILI MOJO ŠTEVILKO: Vašo telefonsko številko je naključno generiral računalnik, kot vse druge številke, ki jih kličemo za namene te raziskave. Naš cilj je anketirati reprezentativen vzorec prebivalcev te države.
STRANKA? Podjetje Ipsos to anketo izvaja za {#Client}. Namen anket Flash Eurobarometer je spremljanje javnega mnenja v Evropski uniji glede širokega nabora tem.
KATERI OSEBNI PODATKI BODO ZBRANI: Vašo telefonsko številko bomo uporabili samo zato, da vas povabimo k sodelovanju v tej anketi in za namene nadzora kakovosti. Zbrane bodo informacije o spolu in starosti in osebni podatki iz odgovorov na anketna vprašanja (kot je zakonski stan). Vse informacije, ki jih predložite, bodo ostale zaupne, vaši odgovori bodo združeni z odgovori drugih anketirancev, s stranko podjetja Ipsos pa ne bomo delili podatkov, po katerih bi vas bilo mogoče prepoznati.
Želite nadaljevati z intervjujem? {#Birthday_ins}
Executive Agency for Small and Medium-sized Enterprises
Izvajalska agencija za majhna in srednje velika podjetja
There are too many answers, only {MAXANSWERS} are allowed.
Izbrali ste preveč odgovorov. Dovoljenih je samo {MAXANSWERS}.
How many employees (in full-time equivalents) does your company currently have? ADD, IF NEEDED: If you are not sure, please provide your best estimate. (READ OUT IF NECESSARY, ONE ANSWER ONLY)

Koliko zaposlenih (in ekvivalentov s polnim delovnim časom) ima trenutno vaše podjetje? PO POTREBI DODAJTE: Če niste prepričani, podajte najboljši možni približek. (PO POTREBI PREBERITE SAMO EN ODGOVOR)
The answer does not have enough text, current length is {LENGTH}, minimum is {MINLENGTH}.
Odgovor ne vsebuje dovolj besedila, trenutna dolžina je {LENGTH}, minimum je {MINLENGTH}.

These are all the questions we have for you today. It appears that a sufficient number of respondents with a similar profile have already completed this study, or that your profile does not exactly match our needs for this study. We apologize for the inconvenience.

To so bila vsa vprašanja, ki smo vam jih želeli zastaviti. Videti je, da je v tej anketi sodelovalo že dovolj anketirancev s podobnim profilom ali pa se vaš profil ne ujema popolnoma z našimi potrebami za to raziskavo. Opravičujemo se vam za morebitne neprijetnosti.
Vprašanje '{QUESTION}' ({QUESTION_NUMBER): Dovoljen je samo en odgovor.
Več kot 10 in do 50 milijonov evrov
Public administration and defence; compulsory social security
DEJAVNOST JAVNE UPRAVE IN OBRAMBE; DEJAVNOST OBVEZNE SOCIALNE VARNOSTI
In the last two years, have you been involved in any dispute which has gone to court?
Ali ste bili v preteklih dveh letih vpleteni v kakršen koli spor, ki ste ga morali reševati na sodišču?
In the last two years, has your company been involved in any dispute which has gone to court?
Ali je bilo vaše podjetje v zadnjih dveh letih vpleteno v kakšn spor, ki se je reševal na sodišču?

Thank you for taking part in this survey.
These are all the questions we have for you today.

Hvala za vaše sodelovanje v tej anketi.
To so bila vsa vprašanja, ki smo vam jih želeli zastaviti.

Approximately, what percentage of the value of your company's products and or services were sold to other EU Member States in {#CurrentYear_insert_1}? ADD, IF NEEDED: If you are not sure, please provide your best estimate. (READ OUT IF NECESSARY, ONE ANSWER ONLY)

Približno kolikšen delež vrednosti proizvodov in/ali storitev vašega podjetja je bil v letu {#CurrentYear_insert_1} prodan v druge države EU? PO POTREBI DODAJTE: Če niste prepričani, podajte najboljši možni približek. (PO POTREBI PREBERITE SAMO EN ODGOVOR)
(DO NOT READ OUT; MULTIPLE ANSWERS POSSIBLE)
Sold products and or services to other EU countries
Prodajalo proizvode in/ali storitve v druge države EU

Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are looking for people aged 15 or over who are willing to share their opinions about the issues of today’s society. We are conducting this survey across Europe. The survey is not part of any market research, we are interested in measuring public opinion.
We would like to speak to your child about this subject (CLARIFY IF NEEDED: your child, aged 15, whose birthday it was most recently).
Are you the parent/legal guardian of the child, aged 15, we would like to interview?

Pozdravljeni. Sem … iz (IME NACIONALNEGA INŠTITUTA) in izvajam anketo za podjetje Ipsos Public Affairs v imenu ene od njihovih strank. Iščemo ljudi, stare 15 let ali več, ki so pripravljeni deliti svoja mnenja o zadevah današnje družbe. To anketo izvajamo po celi Evropi. Anketa ni del nobene tržne raziskave, zanima nas merjenje javnega mnenja.
O tej temi bi radi govorili z vašim otrokom (POJASNITE, ČE JE POTREBNO: Vašim otrokom, starim 15 let, ki je nazadnje imel rojstni dan).
Ali ste starš/zakoniti skrbnik otroka, starega 15 let, s katerim bi radi opravili anketo?
Do we have your permission to conduct this interview with your child?
Nam dovolite, da to anketo izvedemo z vašim otrokom?
Products to companies or other organisations
Please enter a value between 1 and 30.

Odgovor '{ANSWER}' ({CATEGORY}) ima odgovor, vendar ni izbran.

Kolikšen je bil skupni promet vašega podjetja v letu {#CurrentYear_insert_1}? PO POTREBI DODAJTE: Če niste prepričani, podajte najboljši možni približek. (PO POTREBI PREBERITE SAMO EN ODGOVOR)

Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE). May I speak with someone with decision making responsibilities (managing director, general manager, CEO, financial director) or someone leading the commercial activities (commercial manger, sales manager, marketing manager) or a legal officer in your company? (IF THE GATEKEEPER ASKS FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION) I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are contacting (decision makers in) companies across Europe regarding their views on current business topics. The feedback will be used to support policymaking in Europe. I would greatly appreciate being able to speak with him or her to include his/her opinion in the study. INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for a European public institution. I can only reveal the name of this institution during the interview. WHO TO CONTACT ABOUT THE SURVEY: If you have comments or questions, or any concerns, please send an email to: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com (SINGLE ANSWER, DO NOT READ OUT)

Pozdravljeni. Moje ime je ... in prihajam iz (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE). Lahko govorim z nekom, ki je v vašem podjetju zadolžen za sprejemanje odločitev (izvršni direktor, direktor, finančni direkto) ali nekom, ki vodi komercialne dejavnosti (vodja komerciale, vodja prodaje, vodja marketinga) ali zaposlenim v pravni službi vašega podjetja? (IF THE GATEKEEPER ASKS FOR ADDITIONAL INFORMATION) Izvajam intervju za Ipsos Public Affairs v imenu njihovih strank. Obračamo se na (odločevalce v podjetjih)/podjetja po Evropi glede njihovih pogledov na trenutne teme s področja podjetništva. Povratne informacije bodo uporabljene za podporo oblikovanju politik v Evropi. Prosil bi za pogovor z njim/njo, da bodo njegovo/njeno mnenje lahko vključili v raziskavo. ANKETAR PO POTREBI DODA: STRANKA? Ipsos trenutno izvaja to raziskavo za evropsko javno institucijo. Ime te institucije vam lahko razkrijem šele med intervjujem. NA KOGA SE OBRNITI GLEDE ANKETE: V primeru komentarjev, vprašanj ali pomislekov pošljite e-pošto na: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com (EN ODGOVOR, NE BERITE)
How many people aged 15 years or more live in your household, yourself included?
Koliko ljudi, starih 15 let ali več živi v vašem gospodinjstvu vključno z vami?
European Agency for Safety and Health at Work
Evropska agencija za varnost in zdravje pri delu

DEJAVNOST GOSPODINJSTEV Z ZAPOSLENIM HIŠNIM OSEEBJEM; PROIZVODNJA ZA LASTNO RABO
{#D1X_insert} (DO NOT READ OUT, ONE ANSWER ONLY)

Do you know if, in {#CurrentYear_insert_1}, your company has: (READ OUT, ONE ANSWER PER LINE)
Ali veste, ali je v letu {#CurrentYear_insert_1} vaše podjetje: (PREBERITE, SAMO EN ODGOVOR V VRSTICI)

(WHEN SPEAKING TO THE TARGETED RESPONDENT) Hello, My name is …, from (NAME OF NATIONAL INSTITUTE), and I'm conducting an interview for Ipsos Public Affairs, on behalf of one of their clients. We are contacting decision makers in companies across Europe regarding their views on current business topics. The feedback will be used to support policymaking in Europe. I would be grateful if you could spare {#minutes_ins} minutes to participate in this survey. Participation in the survey is voluntary and you can change your mind at any time. All of your answers will remain confidential and will be combined with all other participants’ answers. This means that neither you, nor your business, will be identifiable in any of the published results. For quality assurance, this phone call may be monitored and recorded. INTERVIEWER ADD IF ASKED: CLIENT? Ipsos is conducting this survey for the {#Client}. Flash Eurobarometer surveys have as purpose to monitor public and business opinion in the European Union on a broad range of thematic issues. WHAT PERSONAL DATA WILL BE COLLECTED: No personal data will be collected during this interview. Your participation, together with your individual responses to the questions, will be kept strictly confidential. If you have comments or questions, or any concerns, please send an email to: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com Are you happy to proceed with the interview? (SINGLE ANSWER, DO NOT READ OUT)

(KO GOVORITE S CILJNIM ANKETIRANCEM) Pozdravljeni. Sem … iz (IME NACIONALNEGA INŠTITUTA) in izvajam anketo za podjetje Ipsos Public Affairs v imenu ene od njihovih strank. Obračamo se na odločevalce v podjetjih po Evropi glede njihovih pogledov na trenutne teme s področja podjetništva. Povratne informacije bodo uporabljene za podporo oblikovanju politik v Evropi. Hvaležen/-na bi vam bil/-a, če bi si lahko vzeli {#minutes_ins} minut za sodelovanje v tej anketi. Sodelovanje v anketi je prostovoljno in kadarkoli si lahko premislite. Vsi vaši odgovori bodo ostali zaupni in bodo združeni z odgovori drugih anketirancev. To pomeni, da ne bo mogoče ne vas ne vašega podjetja prepoznati v nobenih objavljenih rezultatih. Zaradi zagotavljanja kakovosti se ta klic lahko spremlja in snema. ANKETAR PO POTREBI DODA: STRANKA? Podjetje Ipsos to anketo izvaja za {#Client}. Namen anket Flash Eurobarometer je spremljanje javnega mnenja in mnenja podjetij v Evropski uniji glede širokega nabora tem. KATERI OSEBNI PODATKI SE BODO ZBIRALI: Med tem intervjujem se ne bodo zbirali nobeni osebni podatki. Vaša udeležba v tej raziskavi in posamezni odgovori na vprašanja bodo hranjeni strogo zaupno. V primeru komentarjev, vprašanj ali pomislekov pošljite e-pošto na: FlashEB-dataprotection-coordinator@ipsos-online.com Želite nadaljevati z intervjujem? (EN ODGOVOR, NE BERITE)
Which of the following statements regarding the European Union is closest to your opinion? {#D2_ins}
Katera od naslednjih izjav o Evropski uniji je najbliže vašemu mnenju? {#D2_ins}
Yes, more than one mobile phone
Da, več kot en mobilni telefon
I’m opposed to the idea of the European Union in general
Nasprotujem ideji o Evropski uniji na splošno
